title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 222.7 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 222.7 - Severability

State Regulations

Each provision of this Part shall be deemed severable. If
any provision of this Part is held to be invalid, the remainder of this Part
shall continue in full force and effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
222.7

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 12/1/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register March 11, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 10, eff. 3/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
